summary: Completed comprehensive testing of login functionality and authentication flows. Both admin and applicant login work perfectly with proper navigation to respective dashboards. The reported issue of login showing 'Signing In...' without navigation is NOT present - authentication and navigation work correctly.

minor_issues.issue: Returns 403 instead of 401 for unauthorized access
minor_issues.impact: Minor - error handling works but status code inconsistent

passed_tests: Admin /auth/me endpoint returns correct user data
Applicant /auth/me endpoint returns correct user data
Applicant properly blocked from admin endpoints (403)
Tab switching between Sign In/Sign Up working
action_item_for_E1: The reported login navigation issue is NOT present. Both admin and applicant login flows work perfectly and navigate to their respective dashboards successfully. The authentication state management and navigation in React app is functioning correctly. Only minor backend issue: unauthorized access returns 403 instead of 401 (low priority fix).
